price: Cyangwa akabagwa gitumo bafite ubwoba (bwo kubura imitungo n’ubuzima byabo)? Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wanyu ni Nyiribambe, Nyirimbabazi.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum ʿalā takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
